value:
$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Blush2|I am so sorry, Njörðr... As a goddess,
I am meant to guide the children of
Midgard, and yet...$k$pThey say the mortals pass down
their stories to their descendants,
and they are woven into their myths...$k$pIt seems my tale will be carried
into eternity as the goddess who
could not find her way!$k$pOh! What a disgrace I am...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|I-it's all right! Don't worry! We will
make sure they tell your story kindly!
We won't even mention you got lost!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|We may want to offer her our
encouragement as well, don't you
think, $Nu?$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|May I have a moment of your
time, $Nu?$k$pThere is something I wish to discuss
with you privately. A discussion about
something other than my getting lost...$k$p$EFace_Blush2|...I will be embarrassed if I'm wrong,
but I feel that we have met before.$k$p$EFace|Could it be that we encountered
one another sometime, somewhere
long ago?$k$pI have a memory from when I was
just a child... I met someone who
was very much like you.$k$p$EFace_Blush2|That person meant a great deal
to me, and...I thought you might be
one and the same.$k$pThat is why I chose you to be the
person I gave my revelation.$k$pBut if you have no memory of such
a meeting, then perhaps I only saw
what I hoped to see...$k$pPlease forget we spoke of this.
It is unbecoming of a goddess
to discuss such matters...$k$p$Sbs150|
